articles.author: Newsweek
articles.title: Donald Trump Invited China's Xi to Presidential Inauguration: Report
articles.description: Trump's team is considering inviting foreign leaders to next month's ceremony.
articles.content:
President-elect Donald Trump has invited Chinese President Xi Jinping to his inauguration, CBS News reported Wednesday evening, citing multiple anonymous sources.
Early in November, Trump asked Xi to come to the January 20 ceremony, but it is not cle... [2815 chars]

articles.author: New York Daily News
articles.title: YouTuber Legal Eagle files lawsuit for Trump investigation records
articles.description: YouTuber Legal Eagle has filed a lawsuit against the FBI and the DOJ to make public their findings in the criminal cases against Donald Trump.
articles.content:
Attorney Devin Stone, better known as popular YouTuber Legal Eagle, announced Wednesday that he’s filed a lawsuit against the FBI and the DOJ to make public their findings in the federal criminal cases against President-elect Donald Trump.

articles.author: Newsweek
articles.title: Trump Pardoning January 6 Rioters Would Be Unpopular: Poll
articles.description: More than 60 percent of Americans would disapprove of Trump pardoning those convicted in the attack on the U.S. Capitol, a new poll found.
articles.content:
More than 60 percent of Americans surveyed said they oppose President-elect Donald Trump pardoning his supporters who were convicted in the January 6 attack on the U.S. Capitol, according to a new poll.
Trump, who will return to the White House next ... [2847 chars]

articles.author: Page Six
articles.title: Donald Trump Jr. and Bettina Anderson surprised by pap shots
articles.description: Donald Trump Jr. and Bettina Anderson were surprised by the paparazzi shots that came out of them holding hands over the weekend in Palm Beach.
articles.content:
Paparazzi photos emerged earlier this week that confirmed to the rest of the world that Donald Trump Jr. is in a relationship with socialite Bettina Anderson.
But the romance was already on display to Palm Beach locals.

articles.author: CP24 Toronto
articles.title: Ford, Trudeau meet on Trump tariff threat
articles.description: Ontario Premier Doug Ford threated to cut off energy supply to the U.S. in response to the tariffs President-elect Donald Trump plans to impose on all Canadian imports.
articles.content:
The premiers will virtually discuss a joint plan to tackle the threat of 25% tariffs on Canadian imports by incoming U.S. president Donald Trump.

articles.author: New York Daily News
articles.title: Mayor Adams holding high-stakes meeting with Trump border czar amid growing fear of mass deportations
articles.description: The Trump administration's immigration policies could have far-reaching effects in New York and advocacy organizations upset by Adams' meeting are planning to rally outside City Hall Thursday.
articles.content:
Mayor Adams is scheduled for a high-stakes meeting with President-elect Trump’s new border czar Tom Homan Thursday amid growing fear among immigrants and advocates over the incoming president and his threats to carry out mass deportations.

articles.title: UPDATE 2-Trump's NASA pick may pause his private SpaceX astronaut trips
articles.description: "It may wind up on hold for a little bit." Isaacman, a private astronaut and billionaire founder of payment processing company Shift4 Payments, owns the Polaris program, a series of private missions to space on SpaceX vehicles that have made him a key customer and associate of Musk.

articles.title: Pritzker says he'd protect most immigrants from deportation
articles.description: Gov. J.B. Pritzker again promised to protect immigrants from mass deportations threatened by President-elect Donald Trump.

articles.title: Trump's DOJ forced Apple to share customers' call & text data
articles.description: A report from the Office of the Inspector General concludes that the Trump-era DOJ forced Apple to secretly share customers' private data.
